      • setDimColor

        public void setDimColor(int color,
                        float alphaPercentage)
        Set the color and opacity for the dim background. Must be called before show to have effect.
        Parameters:
        color - Color of background
        alphaPercentage - Percentage of alpha. Must be in range of 0..1
